author: A_Brickset_user
title: Exellent addition for The Riding Stable
review: The car self is nice, you can put the saddle in the back of the car, The fig is nice, the horse is nice. The trailer for the horse is nice done, you can put the horse forwards or backwards in it. The blue thing is nice to let the fig ride on it behind the horse.

author: shenron
title: Classy transportation model
review:
Although there have been many horse transportation vehicles throughout the years, this one is probably the best. It has a very classy look with its red and white color scheme.

The car is quite a standard built but with a clear shift towards 4x4 thanks to minimal adjustments such as the front mudguard and the large wheels. Country but modern, thanks to the nice half-glass backdoor that opens to the saddle storage room.

The trailer looks great with the open areas on the back and for the horse face, and has 4 opening pieces: the back stopper, the roof, and two low doors in the front probably for cleaning.

Thanks to the very nice look, this vehicle still fits perfectly together with the latest town sets.

As a minor gripe, a chair for the car and one for the chariot would have made this set perfect.
